TopicTitle: A new series of Minecraft animations I'm making.

Articles.Content:
And, for once, a Minecraft animation is not MC themed, but a blend of Frozen (the movie) and mud. It's as hilarious of an idea as it sounds. But, the new series is called Anna-Mations, since the main character in them will be Anna from Frozen.

I will use this page to keep you updated on the series. So, here's the series in its current state, every episode.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

EPISODE 1: Danger! Deep Mud!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iYHQWTlEXVE

EPISODE 2: No words can describe this.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A5ZEY6IOsnI

EPISODE 3: Anna's Muddy Dive

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=osKCz2FfjGA

EPISODE 4: Chest Waders Get Real Muddy

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hmGwRG4CBE8

At least it makes fun of frozen......... Although I would prefer the one who wants to build a snowman getting shot by the other one...... (I am not going to write their Names)
The titles and thumbnails are so creepy that I do not even want to watch this. The ksp forum is not a place for this.
Someone has to ban this guy or at LEAST make a Encyclopedia Dramatica page about this. Flaunting your mud fetish around is NOT OKAY.

Closing and going for a shower
